Yes people,quark is meant to be watched as 20-40 says.If you have an HDMI output on your laptop connect it to your T.V. or if you have a play station(I don't have one)use that.Too many people come back and complain about the picture quality but if they only would listen to 20-40's advice there would be no complaints.Those of us who love the quark do not want to lose it again.Respect the quark and the quark will respect you.;0)
